name: Samsung Epic 4G™ a Galaxy S™ phone
description: The smartphone just became brilliant. The Samsung Epic™ 4G a Galaxy S™ phone, exclusively at Sprint, offers a robust set of entertainment features and represents a high level of mobile intelligence. The 4.0" Super AMOLED™ display is stunningly bright while also conserving battery life. Combining 4G network capabilities with a powerful one-gigahertz processor, the Samsung Epic™ 4G is built for speed. Add in a sliding QWERTY keyboard, a front facing camera and the unlimited possibilities of the Android™ platform, and the Epic 4G is truly brilliant.
